title: Team Europe Celebrates Ryder Cup Win
headline: Those Guys Can Party: Team Europe Celebrates Ryder Cup Win
description: On-the-green photoshoots, kilts and wigs, and selfies galore -- all accompanied by copious amounts of champagne -- the European Ryder Cup team celebrated their 16.5-11.5 win over the United States in grand style. Here are a few of our favorite photos from the celebrations.
short_headline: Those Guys Can Party: Team Europe Celebrates Ryder Cup Win
page_title: Team Europe Celebrates Ryder Cup Win
slug: Those Guys Can Party: Team Europe Celebrates Ryder Cup Win
body: On-the-green photoshoots, kilts and wigs, and selfies galore -- all accompanied by copious amounts of champagne -- the European Ryder Cup team celebrated their 16.5-11.5 win over the United States in grand style. Here are a few of our favorite photos from the celebrations.
